name: Lullatone – Falling for Autumn CD
description: All prices are in Singapore dollars, SGD$. Tracklistings (10 tracks): 1. Look up! there is a perfect gradient in the top of that tree 2. Here comes the sweater weather 3. New stationery for a new semester 4. The biggest pile of leaves you have ever seen 5. Animal crossing signs on the highways in other countries 6. Seasonal produce 7. An awkward dinner conversation at a family gathering 8. Just walking around 9. Adventure music for migrating birds 10. Raindrops plucking the last leaves from a tree Each CD comes with an autographed postcard, hand signed by Shawn & Yoshimi. Click here to read up on our interview with Lullatone under dröm sessions. All prices stated here in SGD$. All products are shipped with registered shipping, except for Singapore.

name: Playground Mini Magnets
description: All prices are in Singapore dollars, SGD$. Fashioned after Singapore's Iconic old school mosaic playgrounds. (circa 1970/1980). The playground was our school, our imagination, our friend; life lessons were learnt through bruises gathered from knocking against colourful mosaic tiles, by scraping our knees falling on gritty sandpits, the feeling of sand between our toes. Comes in a set of 3 mini magnets: • Dragon – 1.5cm(h) X 2.6cm(w) • Elephant – 1.5cm(h) X 2.5cm(w) • Pelican – 1.5cm(h) X 1.7cm(w) All products are shipped with registered shipping, except for Singapore.

name: Chope! Book
description: All prices are in Singapore dollars, SGD$. The eccentric lingoes of Singapore's Kopitiam culture. Content Outline: • Our peculiar lingoes • The art of ordering Teh in a Kopitiam • The art of ordering Kopi in a Kopitiam • Nicknames of popular drinks in a Kopitiam • La Kopi, Gossips, Gather • Kopitiam soccer lingo • Sounds of Singapore Click here to view more spreads. Book specifications: 112 pages • A5 • Hard cover • Thread sewn and perfect bound • Published in 2013 • Printed in Singapore • ISBN 978-981-07-6542-2 This book is part of the Chope! Project, click here to find out more. All products are shipped with registered shipping, except for Singapore.

name: Autograph Notebook (Roses Are Red)
description: All prices are in Singapore dollars, SGD$. Notebook dimensions: 115mm by 170mm 64 pages, soft cover with emboss on typography, and blank on the inside. Roses Are Red Violets Are Blue Sugar Is Sweet And So Are You Remember the good old days of penning your thoughts and impressions of your classmates upon school graduation? From composing friendship verses, farewell poems, folding dog-ears with secret messages, carefully styling your profile page with fluorescent highlighters, colourful markers and metallic pens, to your sincere attempts at describing your friend’s personality by linking attributes to the alphabets of their names… we did them all! We hope this series of notebooks will take you down memory lane as you reminisce on those sweet memories at school. Plastic figurines not included for sale All products are shipped with registered shipping, except for Singapore.

name: Memory Game by Ingela P. Arrhenius
description:
All prices are in Singapore dollars, SGD$.

A classic memory game with lovely illustrations by Swedish illustrator – Ingela P. Arrhenius.

Each person will take a turn to flip 2 cards (at a time), if both cards matches, he/she wins that round. The more you remember which of these cards matches, and the person with the most accumulated winning rounds – wins!

Perfect for a lazy and quiet afternoon at home.

All products are shipped with registered shipping, except for Singapore

options.name: Memory Game by Ingela P. Arrhenius

name: Honeycomb Parade by Ingela P. Arrhenius
description: All prices are in Singapore dollars, SGD$. Prop them up in full bloom and hang them around your house or rooms to brighten up your day! Use them as home decor, or these could be great for parties and celebrations too. These little characters drawn by Swedish illustrator – Ingela P. Arrhenius. 3 different box sets. Each box sold separately. $21 per box. 5 different characters per box. (Inside Pink box): SOLD OUT – Mole – Lady with orange afro hair – Magician with purple hat – Toucan Bird – Elephant (Inside Blue box): SOLD OUT – Lion – Lady with black afro hair – Brown koala bear – Pink fish – Chef (Inside Yellow box): SOLD OUT – Whale – Man in hat – Owl – Polar Bear – Man with mustache in black hat All products are shipped with registered shipping, except for Singapore.

name: Sounds of Singapore Glasses
description: A play on the action words that we use conversationally. It’s hilarious that it’s so subconscious! Different designs available 01. Kiap some beehoon for me hor 02. Tu a fishball for me leh. (SOLD OUT) 03. Buah Some Kaya for me can? 04. Quick eat noodles, Pong already! 05. Aiyo… this kaya toast Chao ta one! 06. Wahlau this biscuit Lau hong one! 07. Yummmmmmmmmmm Seng! 08. Lala a bit, all the sugar is at the bottom. 01. Kiàp: to grasp/get stuck in between 02. Tu: poke 03. Buáh: spread 04. Pong: Expand 05. Chao Ta: Burnt 06. Lau hong: to lose its crispiness 07. Yum Seng: Cheers! Dimensions 14.7cm(h) x 8cm(w) To see these glasses at different angles & close-ups, hop on over to our website. All prices stated here in SGD$. All products are shipped with registered shipping, except for Singapore.

options.name: 01. Kiap some beehoon for me hor
02. Tu a fishball for me leh.
03. Buah Some Kaya for me can?
05. Aiyo… this kaya toast Chao ta one!
06. Wahlau this biscuit Lau hong one!
08. Lala a bit, all the sugar is at the bottom.

name: Wafer Ice Cream Notepad
description:
All prices are in Singapore dollars, SGD$.

Available in 3 flavours: 
• Sweet Corn (yellow)
• Peppermint (green)
• Yam (purple)

Size: 60mm by 100mm

Each notepad is about 270pages.
Cover is a thick card stock with emboss of the wafer grid pattern on it.
Packaged, belly-bound with a Japanese rice paper, and a gold foil sticker as a seal over it.

The wafer ice cream is an iconic and well-loved Singaporean childhood treats. Back in the 80′s, kids would get all excited by the sound of a ringing bell. That would mean that just around the corner are these mobile ice cream vendors (also lovingly named “ice cream uncles” by Singaporeans). This notebook is designed and made to reminisce the good old days of eating these very wafer ice creams.

name: Playground Pins : Baby Dragon
description: All prices are in Singapore dollars, SGD$. Fashioned after Singapore's Iconic old school mosaic playgrounds. (circa 1970/1980). The playground was our school, our imagination, our friend; life lessons were learnt through bruises gathered from knocking against colourful mosaic tiles, by scraping our knees falling on gritty sandpits, the feeling of sand between our toes. Pins available in 6 designs: • Dragon – 2.8cm(h) X 4.5cm(w) • Elephant – 2.8cm(h) X 4.5cm(w) • Pelican – 3cm(h) X 3.5cm(w) • Watermelon – 2cm(h) X 4cm(w) • Dove - 3.3cm(h) X 3.3cm(w) • Baby dragon - 3.6cm(h) X 2.8cm(w) All products are shipped with registered shipping, except for Singapore.

name: I Don't Friend You Book
description: All prices are in Singapore dollars, SGD$. A book celebrating friendships and childhood playtime memories in Singapore (circa 80s – 90s). Using petite hands, foot and imagination at large; games and friendships were formed. "Chi ku pak" and "nehnee nehnee boo boo, you cannot catch me" are amongst some childish lingoes and silly game tunes that are still softly echoing in our heads occasionally. Up till today, we are left amused and confounded by these very ingenious game creators. A recollection of old school playtime memories of kids back in the good old years of 80s/90s. • 72 Pages • Hard Cover • Cloth Bound • ISBN 978-981-08-9285-2 • Size: 14.5cm(w) by 18.5cm(h) • includes interactive pages for reader to participate in the games View more spreads at our flickr or our blog . All products are shipped with registered shipping, except for Singapore.

name: WERK Magazine No.18  (Last copy)
description: WERK NO. 18: KEIICHI TANAAMI last 2 copies WERK No. 18 focuses on Keiichi Tanaami, a Japanese artist and designer who often produces colourful psychedelic art and has exhibited widely in painting, print and film. About 200 unpublished drawings by Tanaami is featured in this issue. We love how each cover is hand coloured using various medium like chalk, crayon and graphite. Edition: 1000 copies, Made in Singapore Designed by Theseus Chan. Please note that since all covers are hand coloured, they vary from each other. We will select any random cover/colour for your purchase as no one cover looks exactly the same as another. All prices stated here in SGD$. All products are shipped with registered shipping, except for Singapore.

name: $20 Printed voucher / E-voucher
description:
All prices are in Singapore dollars, SGD$.

Vouchers are available in 2 options:

1) Printed Voucher
Each voucher comes packed with a postcard, packaged in a self sealed plastic sleeve. Vouchers are only valid for use at our Singapore retail store within 6 months from date of purchase.

2) E Voucher
An e-voucher would be emailed to you, with a one time use code that can be used at our online shop. 


All products are shipped with registered shipping, except for Singapore.
